title: G20 agrees to push ahead with digital tax: communique
text: Group of 20 finance ministers agreed on Saturday to compile common rules to close loopholes used by global tech giants such as Facebook to reduce their corporate taxes, a copy of the bloc's draft communique obtained by Reuters showed.

title: Big tech's antitrust fears give investors a rare chance to buy Facebook, Amazon on the cheap
text: Washington's apparent assault on big tech companies like Alphabet, Facebook and Amazon could be a blessing in disguise for investors as they present a massive buying opportunity.
